title: Save a Hundred Bucks on the Google Pixel Tablet with this Deal!
description: It's 25% cheaper at the moment. The post Save a Hundred Bucks on the Google Pixel Tablet with this Deal! appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Mike Viray
text: If you’re looking for a fairly-capable Android tablet for everyday use, the Google Pixel tablet is a great option thanks to a combination of hardware essentials, as well as software that’s packed with all the core Google features one can expect from a Pixel device. Right now it’s on sale with up to $100 off the usual asking price. The Pixel tablet features a large 11-inch display that makes it ideal for content consumption, web browsing, as well as everyday tasks and productivity. It’s powered by Google’s Tensor G2 chipset, alongside 8GB of RAM and up to 256GB of internal storage. There’s also a large 7,000 mAh battery onboard, and a pair of 8-megapixel cameras for video calls and photos. You can check it out using the link below. Note: this article may contain affiliate links that help support our authors and keep the Phandroid servers running.
